mapper.select: SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.name, p.profile_img, p.email,p.gender, p.enable_status, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.user_id=p.user_id WHERE l.username=#{username} AND l.password=#{password}

SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, p.user_id, p.name, p.profile_img, p.email,p.gender, p.enable_status, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.user_id=p.user_id WHERE l.user_id=#{userId}
